<div class="wf blog-posts" data-id="43ab3a13-c770-4ccb-a2b4-30f4bbe2bf85" data-type="ITBrix.Blog.PostList">
<div class="wf-title">
<h4>
Managing Director's Message
</h4>
</div>
<div class="article">
<div class="aside text-content">
<p style="text-align: justify">
<img alt="Managing Director" src="/ufs/users/d11acffd-5d21-4fe4-b202-40151e600e09/directors/Logo_BOB_New_Icon.png" style="float:left; padding: 0 10px 4px 0;"/>
<a href="/blog/posts/bobs-transformation-is-underway/"></a></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 10pt;"><a href="/blog/posts/bobs-transformation-is-underway/"><span style="line-height: 115%; font-size: 14pt;">BOB’S TRANS-</span></a></p><a href="/blog/posts/bobs-transformation-is-underway/">
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 10pt;"><span style="line-height: 115%; font-size: 14pt;">FORMATION </span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 10pt;"><span style="line-height: 115%; font-size: 14pt;">UNVEILED</span></p>
<p><strong><em>Capitalization, Strict Governance, Modest Risk Lending, Revised Market Focus to Mark Path to Turnaround</em></strong></p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">After three years of challenges, a transformation of our Bank that has been underway since January is netting positive results for us in in asset recovery, credit risk procedures and strategic plans including capitalization. The Bank that emerges will be “leaner, faster and better” in every way from shareholder value to customers and employee satisfaction.</p></a>
<p></p>
</div>
</div>
